name: Hamster Club Quest: The End Of Hamster Club
name_original: Hamster Club Quest: The End Of Hamster Club
description:
Hi everyone, This game is our first product for public We  wish you to enjoy our Game

This game make for who want to learn about C# Unity 😀😀😀

ShortStory :

now the  world where various kinds of beings have developed until they have knowledge and wisdom comparable to that of human beings. And more than half of living creatures have technology or chips implanted in their bodies. These chips are responsible for linking information to each other.

You are  hamster belonging to an organization that fixes system errors or what we call bugs. And this mission that we are given is a city called Punk City. This city used to be called Future City, but due to some strange events, almost the entire city has been affected by people who connect chips to their bodies. Bug The events of that time turned the city that was once known as the city of the future into a city of failure in the blink of an eye. Although the strange events in Punk City at that time have passed for 5 years, but the impact that the city has received is still there.

It therefore became our duty this time to deal with the effects of the strange event at that time. The mission assigned this time will be successful or not depends on you.

Developer:

Apicha sintuchai (M)

Tanaphat Phomak (Flukz) 

Khittimasug Jangpai (Arm)
